description: Department type (Operations, Support, Compliance, Finance, Technology, Legal)
Age of department in years since establishment
Geographic location type (Urban, Remote, Suburban, International)
Reason for department creation (Merger, Expansion, Regulation, Restructuring, Innovation)
Primary oversight entity (Internal_Audit, External_Auditor, Compliance_Officer, Board_Committee)
Number of compliance violations in past 3 years
Number of missed or incomplete reports annually
Digital compliance management systems in use (0=No, 1=Yes)
Inter-departmental collaboration quality (1=Very Low to 5=Very High)
Resource availability for compliance (1=Very Low to 5=Very High)
Frequency of external stakeholder interactions (1=Rare to 5=Very Frequent)
Operational risk exposure level (1=Very Low to 5=Very High)
Financial risk exposure level (1=Very Low to 5=Very High)
Composite risk score (weighted combination of risk factors)
Final annual compliance score (0-100) - PRIMARY TARGET
